Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Simon B
Reviews.Content: western pergolese hotel arc de triomphe located top champs elysee hotel value especially cost paris market staff feel welcome free internet bonus spoke english quick help local restaurants eat hotel located near argentine metro station

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for The Palais de Congres”
Reviews.Author: Richard W
Reviews.Content: located value money hotels stayed palais de congres staff helpful friendly larger usual paris hotel breakfast absolutely quick bite close arc de triomphe etc available

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in a superb location”
Reviews.Author: AmarillaArvika
Reviews.Content: nice hotel walking distance champs elysees sights close metro station easy transport airport charles de gaulle arrived late booked advance lucky day price service clean little extras expect hotel price range recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: hotel staff extremely friendly helpful location 10 minute walk arc de triomphe equipped mini bar towelling robes included standard buffet breakfast worth price wifi fine noise free breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Tinuks
Reviews.Content: ti arrived hotel tired middle night pleased checked 5 minutes receptionist extremely friendly helpful fairly paris hotel bathroom nice location minutes walk avenue champs elysses excellent shopping trip metro stations close definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Friendly atmosphere, good location”

Reviews.Content: fairly hotel paris location congress center arc de triomphe champs elysees size decent shower downside paid 240 euro 1 night booked night book

Reviews.Title: “Comfy & Central”
Reviews.Author: AMK1981
Reviews.Content: weekend stay november lovely little hotel basic reception bit compact beds super comfortable pillows comfortable slept modern hotel comfy bathrobes provided bath shower bathroom shower warm mini bar expensive staff accommodating arrived flight hotel 1130am able straight brilliant hotel location 20 min walk eiffel tower 10 mins arc 5 min walk nearest metro lots restaurants nearby delicious boulangerie doorstep recommend hotel comfort excellent location

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel located near metro walking distance champs elysees quiet clean suits classification 4 star internet free nice simple continental buffet breakfast confortable beds nice attendants reception

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel for business or leisure”

Reviews.Content: highly recommend hotel pergolese paris stayed month location ideal 10mn walking distance champs elysees plenty restaurants tube station close ideal discover paris paris standard staff helpful breakfast buffet amazing

Reviews.Title: “fantastic hotel, great staff, good value”
Reviews.Author: carstef
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel whilst tiny bathroom arrived paris cold snowy warm day walking city snow hot bath magic definate bonus close metro food options staff helpful polite reasons chose hotel review staff stay

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Andre79
Reviews.Content: hotel located 500 arc de triomphe congress center close metro station arranged building narrow hallways intimate cosy atmosphere nicely decorated breakfast convenient tea coffee arrangements extra thanks staff helpful polite english speakers

Reviews.Title: “A great choice of hotel for a family break in Paris.”
Reviews.Author: w-spoons
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights 2 adults children 13 11 mid august booking family breakfast direct hotel hotel location bit hectic staying touristy safe 2 minutes argentine metro tended charles de gaulle etoile arc de triomphe station 5 minutes walk giving access metro 2 stops louvre ran direct disneyland paris worth visiting day tiring travelled cdg airport taking 1 hour using rerb handful restaurants close french street hotel italian street shop drinks snacks fruit etc till midnight near argentine metro entrance hotel reception staff welcoming helpful spoke english difficulty conversing breakfast staff family main reason booking hotel disappointed size private hall double twin own bathroom air conditioning teacoffee tray television free safe squashed quad spotlessly clean comfortable selection breakfast continental choice surprised sausage scrambled egg bacon lucky bacon day kept running breakfast organisation bit chaotic left fed highly recommend hotel pergolese especially reception staff cleanliness family

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: wherenext_10
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights greatly enjoyed clean necessities bit staff incredibly helpful booked minute tour airfrance shuttle cdg airport quick affordable dropping 5minute walk hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Service but not a central location”
Reviews.Author: DavenOris
Reviews.Content: nice stay 5 nights pretty standard europe bathroom nice clean staff helpful lots cafes close metro liked little centrally located hotel nice little bit central paris overall highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience - strongly advise.”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoFamily2010
Reviews.Content: stayed nights family suite basically lockout type separate king 2 twin beds hotel run helpful friendly professional staff staff spoke english nice hotel clean safe staff helped book meals locations ride airport ready time liked location couple hundred yards arc tourist location nice cafes couple blocks enjoyed meals wine reasonable price paris size bathrooms roomy particularly paris families teenagers couples real winner business people hotel visitors staff happy
